articles.title: South Africa’s ANC loses 30-year parliamentary majority after election - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: African National Congress vote share drops to 40 percent, forcing it to seek coalition partners to form government.
articles.content: The African National Congress (ANC) party has lost its parliamentary majority in a historic election result that puts South Africa on a new political path for the first time since the end of the apar… [+2538 chars]

articles.author: Robert Legare
articles.title: Feds charge retired 4-star Navy admiral in alleged bribery scheme - CBS News
articles.description: A grand jury indicted Adm. Robert Burke (ret.), the former commander of U.S. naval forces in Europe and Africa,  on four counts of conspiracy and bribery.
articles.content:

DVIDS, Allied Joint Force Command Naples
